short_summary: Supply and deliver defibrinated sheep blood
description: Public Health Agency of Canada has a request for supply and deliver De?brinated sheep blood .
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Managed by Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bids from qualified suppliers for the procurement of defibrinated sheep blood.

### Tender Details:
| **Description** | **English**                      | **French**                           |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Tender Title        | Defibrinated Sheep Blood RISO    | Sang de Mouton Défibriné DISO         |
| Reference Number    | WS4544698459-Doc4553992814     | WS4544698459-Doc4553992814           |
| Amendment Number    | 1                                | 1                                    |
| Solicitation Number | WS4544698459                     | WS4544698459                         |
| Publication Date     | 2024-04-26                        | 2024-04-26                           |
| Tender Closing Date | 2024-05-28T14:00:00               | 2024-05-28T14:00:00                  |
| Amendment Date      | 2024-05-10                        | 2024-05-10                           |
| Expected Contract Start Date/dateDebutContratPrevue | 2024-06-14                        | 2024-06-14                           |
| Expected Contract End Date | 2028-05-30  | 2028-05-30                         |

### Tender Goal:
Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) has a requirement to procure defibrinated sheep blood for its medical needs.

### Tender Categories:

- Unspsc: *Blood manufacture products
- Unspsc Description: *Blood manufacture products
- Procurement Category:*GD
- Procurement Method: *Competitive – Open bidding
- Procurement Method Description: Indicates that suppliers may submit a bid to provide Defibrinated Sheep Blood
- Selection Criteria: *Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements:

- The contract is open to suppliers who are eligible under the below trade agreements:

| **Trade Agreement**         | **English**                                                     | **French**                                                    |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)    | Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)                       | Accord de libre-échange Canada-Pérou (ALECP)                   |
| Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK)  | Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (
